I have never seen a game with a worst dedicated work on it, i only ask for a balanced game where you can play without all the shity stuff that happens every time, (i get banned because the game cant connect to servers and there are hackers showing their habilities without beeing banned), its just about dedicate time for make the game expirience better because right now its like if seven monkeys were just hitting the keyboard randomly and dont care a shit about their product. And i dont even mencionated that if you want a complete competitive game expirience you need to pay more than you have already paid for the game when you bought it. TAKE CARE ABOUT THE PEOPLE THAT IS PLAYING YOUR GAME, JUST THAT.
